title: #57: Behavior and Stalking in the Baton Rouge Killings
description:
In the latest episode about the Baton Rouge serial killings, the Real Crime Profile team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) examine the behavior of the killer, how stalking became part of the profile and how the victims were considered to be in "low risk situations."

#HerNameWasGeralyn #HerNameWasMurray #HerNameIsDianne

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime
